children.markdown:
Friday night saw me at #TweetupLondon, an impromptu drinkies session after the Somesso 09 conference. Good beer, good conversation and a good time.
Here’s a wee bit of video I shot, featuring [Jason Falls](http://www.socialmediaexplorer.com/), [Andy Piper](http://andypiper.wordpress.com/), [Dennis Howlett](http://blogs.zdnet.com/Howlett/), [Andrea Vascellari](http://www.andreavascellari.com/) and [Sarah Blow](http://girlygeekdom.blogspot.com/), as well as others whose names elude me.
[TweetupLondon](http://vimeo.com/4691309) from [Adam Tinworth](http://vimeo.com/adders) on [Vimeo](http://vimeo.com). Oh, and there are [some photos on Flickr](http://www.flickr.com/photos/adders/sets/72157618251149641/), too.
